definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: It is simply that the tactic should always respond to the rival in the way that astonishes him most.
sentences.chinese: 就是说一个战术应该最大程度地引起对手的惊讶。

sentences.english: Building offside tactics is one kind when use regulation and design defends tactics.
sentences.chinese: 造越位战术是利用规则而设计的一种防守战术。

sentences.english: Building offside tactics is one kind when use regulation and design defends tactics.
sentences.chinese: 造越位战术是利用规则而设计的一种防守战术。

sentences.english: In his view, Posey is still learning the team's offensive and defensive tactics.
sentences.chinese: 他认为，波西还在学习球队的攻防战术。

sentences.english: Tactics matter and the combats will take your breath away.
sentences.chinese: 技巧和战术的运用将只在转瞬之间。

sentences.english: Policing tactic is an important component in arresting action.
sentences.chinese: 警察战术机动是缉捕行动的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: European officials described the tactics as inexplicable.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲官员形容为莫名的战术。

sentences.english: A mustering hall allows troops to be selected and trained to a basic standard.
sentences.chinese: 城寨军营对军队进行基本战术训练。

sentences.english: I'll adjust myself to the strategy and tactic for the fighter.
sentences.chinese: 我要把自己应对对手的战略战术调整到最好就是了。

sentences.english: Tamika's superior combat skills have put her in a position of power within the military forces of Deyja.
sentences.chinese: 塔米克出众的战术技巧使她在迪雅的军队中倍受尊敬。

sentences.english: I think they were not using the right tactics and formations.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得他们的战术和阵型都有问题。

sentences.english: They believe that culture super cedes strategy and tactics.
sentences.chinese: 他们相信，文化远远超越战略战术。

sentences.english: The drive-by attack appeared to be a new tactic for the militants.
sentences.chinese: 飞车袭击似乎成为武装分子的一个新战术。

sentences.english: The US military often uses the tactic of gunboat diplomacy to squelch acts of terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 美国军方常使用炮艇外交的战术来粉碎恐怖主义行动。

sentences.english: Izurieta based much of his tactical thinking on Sun Tzu’s “Art of War.”
sentences.chinese: 伊苏列塔的战术思维主要以《孙子兵法》为蓝本。

sentences.english: The TEWS (Tactical Electronic Warfare System) is positioned in the upper right corner of the instrument panel .
sentences.chinese: 电子战术威胁显示器位于仪表板的右上方。

definition: to play (a card)/to make a move in a game
to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
formation (of a sports team, troops etc)
individual soldier/(literary) isolated military unit, cut off from reinforcements
dominant/controlling/strong/opposite: weak, yielding 弱受/to take by storm (military)
